originalText: rc_jared
Start Element
jared
$(context.player.Name), I just want to thank you so much for helping me back there. Not many are as kind as you and Aliza are. Take care.
What!?

::The man's wide-open eyes and frozen expression remind you of a rathound that found itself in the way of a high-speed train. He does manage to utter a few words after a moment of shock.::

What? But...
Huh? How can I help you?
context.loc_rc1_jaredCaught
Hold it right there, criminal scum! So, you're the one who's been stealing the medical supplies.

::The doc too seems surprised at this unexpected event.::

What is going on here? Jared?
context.npc_doc_questcomplete
::The man drops on his knees and begs with a whisper.:: Please, man, don't report me. I ain't a bad man, come on. I've been doing this 'cause I had to. I meant no harm.
I wasn't sneaking! I just... I...
Why do you think the Faceless attacked Rail Crossing?
Have you noticed anyone unusual going to Buzzer's shop recently? Someone you think could be linked to the Faceless wanting to occupy his store.
Can I ask you a few questions about this place?
Goodbye.
I hope you have a very good explanation for this.
Thievery deserves no tolerance. ::Attack!::
So you've been stealing the supplies this whole time. Why, Jared?
I've no idea. Whatever it is, I hope it ends quickly and without any more bloodshed.
No, man, I'm sorry. Buzzer's shop is pretty well known, so lotsa people go there.
Sorry, man, can't help you right now.

Please - listen. I only needed the painkillers, you see, I... I have an addiction. I got shot several months ago by some lousy Ironhead. Doctor Boudreau treated me back then, and I got addicted to those freaking painkillers. I needed them, man, I couldn't do without them, and I knew she wouldn't give them to me anymore. You have to understand me, man.

::His face disappears in his palms.:: I bought this upon myself... I'm so stupid. Stupid idiot! 

There's no running now I suppose... I won't try to escape.

::Jared answers after a few moments, his face pale, his voice trembling.::

I can explain everything: Ever since I had that injury several months ago, from that Ironhead that shot me, I've... I've been addicted to painkillers. I know, it's pathetic. I've been stealing them for some time from the lockers, but I also took other things to eliminate the chance someone would suspect me.
Although, from the stories I heard about Tunnelers... ::He shakes his head.::
::He points to the barkeeper.:: He might know something. Yeah, plenty of Buzzer's customers tend to stop by this place before they leave RC, from what I've seen.
I'm sure you'll find some other people to help you out. Yeah?

No one knows about this, 'kay. I stole a bunch of other stuff from the storage so it wouldn't seem like the thief came just for the painkillers. Reduce the chances of someone suspecting me. I feel bad about doing it - but I had to. Please understand.

I'm disappointed in you. This Jared before me, that is not the one I know. I should have you arrested right now for what you did. You endangered everyone in this station. Do you know how much damage you did?
I won't report you if you pay me.
jared5
I...I think you're right. I almost... ::She pauses.:: I'm calling the captain right away.
You should have come to me, you know that?
::Jared listens to your words with a bowed head. He replies with a delay.:: Man. I guess you are right, I *can't* do this forever. Let's go talk to her.
What?
But, Aliza... wait! I'll return--

I can't explain how sorry I am... ::He starts crying.:: I still have some of the things I stole, I have it stashed somewhere. I'll give it back, I promise. And I'll pay for everything I took - everything!
::End Dialog.::
::[Intimidate]:: Fifty charons or I tell the doc everything!
No, Jared! It's too late now.

You will pay for everything, definitely. However... I will not call the captain. Instead, you need help, Jared, and I'm willing to offer it. I'll help you with this addiction. But if you give me any single reason to doubt your honesty again - the consequences will be severe. ::She sighs.:: Deal?
Rc_JaredWantsToTalk
Damn! Okay, okay - I'll pay. Here you go. ::He gives you thirty  charons.::
Fifty...? Okay, I dig. Here you go. ::He gives you fifty charons.::
No way, man, I'm not paying fifty charons.

As far as you're concerned, $(context.player.Name), you've done your part, and I thank you for it. If you ever need free medical assistance, come and see me. Now, please, keep an eye on him while I call the militia.
::He nods.::
Intimidation
rc_theThief
::End Dialog.::
$(context.player.Name), you've done your part, and I thank you for it. If you ever need free medical assistance, come and see me. As for Jared, we've got some more talking before us.

That was all the coins I had, just so you know. You and less of a thief than me.

I'm gone, man.
::End Dialog::
currency\stygiancoin
